thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Site inspection of Uganda business events readiness
thread.title_full: Site inspection of Uganda business events readiness - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Rick T
title: Site inspection of Uganda business events readiness
text:
Must be the best Hotel in Kampala! Great staffers, service...all the amenities required for a business exec including a gym. The Conference Centre is suitable, large auditorium and breakaway boardrooms but overall needs a little attention. Am told a refurb is scheduled this year.
Room Tip: Higher the floor the better! See more room tips
